title: Automobile dealers can claim ITC on demo cars used for promoting sales: CBIC
description: The CBIC has clarified that automobile dealers can claim input tax credit (ITC) under GST for demo cars used to promote sales. However, ITC is not available if these vehicles are used for personal purposes. This clarification aims to reduce tax costs and resolve ongoing litigation in the automotive sector.
